vulnerabilities.title: Regular expression denial of service in semver-regex
vulnerabilities.description: An exponential ReDoS (Regular Expression Denial of Service) can be triggered in the semver-regex npm package, when an attacker is able to supply arbitrary input to the test() method

vulnerabilities.title: semver-regex Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDOS)
vulnerabilities.description: npm `semver-regex` is vulnerable to Inefficient Regular Expression Complexity
